title: My favorite character in Hexakill?
body:
{{champion:201}} 

If you've never played with or against a Braum, let me fill you in.

* 6 people=more people to proc your passive
* 6 enemies=most certainly half of them will be ranged and thus worthless against Braum

You hate dealing with {{champion:81}} {{champion:103}}  and {{champion:99}} ? Braum. 
You like playing {{champion:122}} {{champion:24}}  or {{champion:131}} ? Braum.
Seriously, i never saw anyone else play Braum, and, to be honest, i'm rather fine with it: i like my ranged teammates relevant.

But Braum deals no damage, thus is worthless, right? That's the beauty of it: Braum will deal no damage, and make sure the enemy {{champion:119}}  won't either. Does Draven have CC? None that go through my shield? Glorious.

Sometimes it is annoying not to face champions that rely heavily on their attacks, like {{champion:17}} and his mushroom  or {{champion:412}}  and his instant attacks who go through your shield. But then again, this is also the magic of Braum: when you play Braum, you go full tank mega shield Braum. Braum needs all the shields for his team. {{item:3401}} {{item:3190}}  and makes sure nobody dies. 

Anyone who plays Braum in regular games or likes him, try him out in hexakill. Start {{item:1054}} {{item:3302}}  and have around 800 hp at lvl 1. Braum is not one to die easily.

You still rely on teammates, yes, but when you are Braum, your teammates grow mustache and chest hair, even ladies. Always victory.

Don't worry, Braum was trying little bit.
